Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to reducing tolls for residents of certain counties on the Verrazzano-Narrows bridge
Summary: Reduces tolls for residents of the counties of Kings and Richmond using a New York customer service E-ZPass on the Verrazzano-Narrows bridge.
LawCode: Add ยง553-l, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to reducing tolls for residents of certain counties on the Verrazzano-Narrows bridge
